# The `MIRPrintingPass` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass prints out the LLVM IR to an output stream using the MIR serialization format. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>struct anonymous_namespace{MIRPrintingPass.cpp}::MIRPrintingPass</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This pass prints out the LLVM IR to an output stream using the MIR serialization format.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/mirprintingpass-cpp">MIRPrintingPass.cpp</a>.

getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the MachineBasicBlock CFG.
